markdown:
Spend a bunch of time porting poems from a mangled WP backup JSON, into my site.

Put a lot of warnings on it, content warnings for certain topics, but also a general warning about the state of it. But it's just a crutch to help me accept vulnerability. ğŸ¥²

The poems were written between 2004 and 2007, and honestly, I'm not sure why I stopped. I know what initiated it, which.. requires a post for another time. 

So let's hope the page will eventually grow, and if not, at least it's a nice archive.
